Text: Thanks for putting this up in bluray :-)
thx for this plz tell me you plan to put up season 2 aswell plz.
Thanks, hoping for season 2 also ;) LOVE that there are subs ;)

Thanks for this wonderful upload with subtitles! It's really helpful.
I hope you'll decide to upload the second season as well. There aren't a lot of great sources for that season yet. Please consider.
The audio tracks on episodes 3 and 4 are swapped out with each other. I can correct my own copies, but you may want to repack it if anyone else has this problem.
